[!--
Right now all the images link to external servers. This will be soon fixed. I did this so the page wouldn't be filled with missing images.

[!--
I am having issues with moving the files from sandbox to the mainsite. For this reason I added temporary links to the images. They'll soon be replaced by regular image embeds.

Images:

**Filename:** Halfdollar.jpg
**Name:** Halfdollar.jpg
**Author:** Numismatic Guaranty Corporation
**License:** CC 
 **Source:**[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:1938_Arkansas_Centennial_half_dollar_reverse.jpg]
-----

**Filename:** vehicleincident.jpeg
**Name:** vehicleincident.jpeg
**Author:** sv1ambo
**License:** CC 
 **Source:**[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Multi_vehicle_accident_-_M4_Motorway,_Sydney,_NSW_(8076208846).jpg]*

**Filename:** firecam
**Name:** firecam.jpg
**Author:**  U.S. Forest Service- Pacific Northwest Region
**License:** CC
 **Source:**[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Lick_Fire_on_the_Umatilla_National_Forest_burning_at_night.jpg]*

**Note:** First image, the banner, was put through photoshop and photomosh.
